preqs: Students must have passed AFW2020, ACW2020, ACG2020 or AFG2020 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFC3131, AFF3431, AFW3021}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACB2020, ACG2020, AFG2020, AFW2020} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Topics include the budget planning process including master budget preparation, budgeting standard costs and variance analysis, responsibility accounting, management by objectives and non-financial performance measurement, divisional performance, transfer pricing issues, program budgeting and other approaches, capital budgeting, strategic planning and control.
